bibl.title: P.Köln III 127 and P.Oxy. XXX 2512: Two Fragments, one Manuscript, of a Homeric cento. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: P. Köln III, 127 (= M.-P.3 1225.1) and P. Oxy. XXX, 2512 (= M.-P.3 1984.1) are fragments of one and the same manuscript containing a Homeric cento (= LDAB 2411).
bibl.seg: GONIS Nikolaos, P.Köln III 127 and P.Oxy. XXX 2512: Two Fragments, one Manuscript, of a Homeric cento. Avec résumé en anglais.
P. Köln III, 127 (= M.-P.3 1225.1) and P. Oxy. XXX, 2512 (= M.-P.3 1984.1) are fragments of one and the same manuscript containing a Homeric cento (= LDAB 2411).
